name: Shera and the Three Treasures
detailed_description:
When the Demon Lord was defeated years ago, the world was thought to be at peace.

However, a new Demon Lord has risen to power, and now ruin looms on the horizon once again... but not all is lost.

In the remote village of Dexas lives a particular family of an ancient bloodline. This bloodline is capable of defeating the Demon Lord... but its strongest warrior was cursed by the enemy.

Now, it falls to his sister, Shera, to gather the three Sacred Treasures and use them to defeat the Demon Lord, once and for all!

Features:

  • Classic RPG experience
  • Explore a fantasy world
  • Turn-based combat
  • Animated battle sprite

short_description: After the rise of a new Demon Lord, it falls on the chosen hero from an ancient bloodline to stop them. However, due to a curse cast upon him, he must pass the task to his sister Shera. Now she must gather the Three Treasures, and defeat the Demon Lord.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
